PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-06722010-05-27AAFC,  ,  ,  , 
ActPlant Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Phytophthora Ramorum Compensation Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the PHYTOPHTHORA RAMORUM COMPENSATION REGULATIONS in order to continue to provide compensation to persons and businesses who have received a notice to dispose resulting in plant losses and/or costs incurred for treatments when the Agency finds plants and plant material to be infested with Phytophthora ramorum. This will encourage early pest reporting and timely eradication actions which will prevent the spread of Phytophthora ramorum.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0111 Publication Date: 2010-06-09
AttachmentsAttachment
